text:
@kenolin1 I don’t understand it either, but it does tell a lot of those supporters. Injudicious and uneducated. And now with this brainless idol-worshiping gathering they are risking their own and other people’s health. Stupid. Not worth it.
#TulsaCovidFest2020 
#Trump 
#COVID19
